snippet.title: [Quake] Autumn Haunting (Blind Playthrough, Nightmare difficulty, No Saves)
snippet.description:
Played in Ironwail.

Maplist:
0:00 - 24 Tongues of Evil (haunting)
24:28 - The Final Epic (haunting2)

Sequel to Carved in Flesh, which I've already played before, link to playthrough: https://youtu.be/spfGBIs5OYw

Kona's maps became better and better with each release. Sadly this is one of the last maps if not the last he's made for Quake 1.

I really like ideas, new enemies and weapons, but execution is weaker than it could, same as previous maps. Still, a good set of maps with something unique in it.

Mod link: https://www.quaddicted.com/reviews/haunting.html
